thread.title: Meet the Taylor Swift lookalike fooling even the biggest fans | New York Post
thread.title_full: Meet the Taylor Swift lookalike fooling even the biggest fans | New York Post

author: The Sun
title: Meet the Taylor Swift lookalike fooling even the biggest fans | New York Post
text:
Posing for a selfie, at first glance of this image you would think it is pop princess Taylor Swift.
But in fact, the girl in the picture is a lookalike that is an absolute dead ringer for the singer ‚Äì even her most hardened fans have been fooled.
April Gloria, from Kansas is a cosplayer and often posts sultry selfies for her 70,000 Instagram followers .
But with her blonde bob hair style with swept over fringe, blue eyes and a love of wearing red lipstick, she looks exactly like ‚ÄúShake It Off‚Äù hitmaker.
And even her poses are exactly the same as the singer‚Äôs and she often posts selfies with her pet cats ‚Äì similar to Taylor.
On one of her pictures, one of her followers wrote: ‚ÄúOmg she looks just like Taylor swift!‚Äù
While another said: ‚ÄúCould she look anymore like Taylor swift?‚Äù
And one added: ‚ÄòUmmm this girl looks more like Taylor than Taylor.‚Äù
Taylor is thought to be taking a break from the limelight at the moment after telling fans at a concert in Texas last week they were attending her one and only gig of 2017.
It is unclear what the Blank Space star will think of her doppelganger April.
I got a ring light so I, too, can have white rings around my pupils üéâ I'm slowly collecting things to make an amateurish photo studio in my house 
A post shared by April (@april_gloria) on Jan 19, 2017 at 2:15pm PST
